body_html: The situation does not happen if batches have the same number of samples but it gets worse when the number of samples in the final batch becomes more and more smaller (i.e. compare batch sizes 100, 101 (91 samples in final batch) and 111 (1 sample in final batch))
body_text: The situation does not happen if batches have the same number of samples but it gets worse when the number of samples in the final batch becomes more and more smaller (i.e. compare batch sizes 100, 101 (91 samples in final batch) and 111 (1 sample in final batch))
body: The situation does not happen if batches have the **same** number of samples but it gets worse when the number of samples in the final batch becomes more and more smaller (i.e. compare batch sizes 100, 101 (91 samples in final batch) and 111 (1 sample in final batch))
